AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where the legal case is taking place and whose Constitution protects residents from arbitrary stops by governmental agents
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.5th Circuit Court of Appeals: US Court of Appeals circuit reviewing the case regarding roving border patrols and the Brignoni-Ponce standard, providing instructions to jurors on their duties and responsibilities, and upholding the use of the modified Allen charge
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.highways of the United States: public roads where travelers, including those of Hispanic descent, may be stopped by border patrol agents
